subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4030, how did it go?
description_text:
I still haven't received this item.  Showed on its way on December 12th, never had changed. No tracking info or anything.

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer

conversations.body_text: Hi Joey Brewer,  I will notify our operations team to check this immediately. If anything is confirmed missing, we will send a replacement right away. Additionally, this is a PlusX upgrade kit, which is compatible with the older Pro Plus pedals.

Yes.  This is an upgrade for my Pro Pedals.  I ordered the Plus X pedals for my Dad, and the upgrade for myself.

Thank you for looking into this.  

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer
We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have arranged for a replacement to be sent to you.  ​https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047229461444

Thank you so much.  Looking forward to installing it.

Yahoo Mail: Search, Organize, Conquer
